item.title: CVE-2014-8167|2024-08-06T13:10:51.146Z -- vdsm%20and%20vdsclient -- vdsm%20and%20vdsclient
item.description: vdsm and vdsclient does not validate certficate hostname from another vdsm which could facilitate a man-in-the-middle attack
